Name: El Presidente (sans grenadine)
Ingredients: 45 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist and Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Express orange zest twist over cocktail and discard. Garnish with maraschino cherry.
Review: Bone dry, light and delicate. The sweetness and colour contributed by the maraschino cherry garnish are essential to this drink's success.
Nutrition: One serving of El Presidente (sans grenadine) contains 174 calories
